---
title: "Useful Resources"
author: "The Intro to R Team"
editor: visual
---

-   R For Data Science - a must-read e-book for how to handle data in R. <https://r4ds.hadley.nz>

-   Cheetsheets for popular R packages. <https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets>

-   IEP Data Science Project Workteam homepage. <https://interagencyecologicalprogram.github.io/DataScience/>

-   RSeek - Google for R related websites. <https://rseek.org/>

-   Chat GPT and other generative AI apps can help you write code. <https://chatgpt.com/>

-   The R Graph Gallery - get ideas for new types of graphs, and the code to make them. <https://r-graph-gallery.com/>

-   More information on the `tidyverse` packages. <https://www.tidyverse.org/>
